page.title: 12LEOMINSTER SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: A sports hall is being built in{ {Leominster}as part of the Minster Secondary School Complex. Children at the School will use the Centre during the day and the general public will be able to use it in the evenings and at weekends. It is thought that the hall is the largest building to be constructed in{Leominster}since the Priory Church 900 years ago. The main hall itself is 39 metres long and 21 metres wide. In the main hall games such as basketball, badminton, six-a-side football, volleyball, netball and hockey may be played. In addition to the main hall there will also be three squash courts and a fitness room. The Centre will cost Â£750,000 and should be completed by September 1986.
